participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is passionate about sustainability and enjoys connecting with nature. She is creative, open-minded, and friendly.
participant_1.background: I like to go to the farmer's market every weekend. I work in academia at a local university. I live in Nashville. I am committed to the environment. I play music in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Jacob is friendly and curious, with a love for learning and exploring new ideas. He has a laid-back attitude and enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I am a vegetarian. I just started working as a librarian. I am Catholic. My favorite band is Nickelback. I don't know how to swim.

content.text: I'm really into the environment, so I try to go to the farmer's market every weekend.
I'm a vegetarian, so I love the farmer's market too!
That's great! I love finding fresh, local produce.
Me too! I also love supporting small businesses.
I do too. It's important to me to keep my money local.
I agree. I'm also really into music. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock and alternative music.
Me too! I love finding new bands to listen to.
Me too! I'm always on the lookout for new music.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Shins, The National, and The xx.
I love The Shins! I've never heard of The National or The xx, though.
You should check them out! They're great bands.
I will! I'm always looking for new music.
